snippet: Thirteen civilians are gunned down in a previously peaceful region as the president, Ashraf Ghani, meets with international donors in the capital to assure them of promised progress.
abstract: Official from Balkh Province, Afghanistan, reports unidentified gunmen shot and killed at least 13 people; killings occur as Pres Ashraf Ghani meets with international donors at Senior Officials Meeting in Kabul, to assure them country has made progress on security, corruption and other issues.
lead_paragraph: Thirteen civilians are gunned down in a previously peaceful region as the president, Ashraf Ghani, meets with international donors in the capital to assure them of promised progress.

headline.main: Killings a Cloud Over Afghan Leader’s Update on Reforms
headline.print_headline: Killings Are Cloud Over Afghan Leader’s Update on Reforms
